General.Name: Reach plc
General.Description: Reach plc operates as a national and regional news publisher in the United Kingdom and Ireland. The company has various national and regional brands across print and online, including Mirror, Express, Daily Star, Daily Record, Manchester Evening News, Liverpool Echo, Irish Star, OK! magazine, WalesOnline, MyLondon, and Curiously, as well as HullLive, edinburghlive, LeicestershireLive, CorkBeo, ChronicleLive, ECHO, TeessideLive, AberdeenLive, Devon Live, YorkshireLive, football.london, BirminghamLive, new, BristolLive, and Belfastlive. It is also involved in the circulation; digital classified print advertising; third-party printing contracts; print other activities comprising contract publishing, syndication, and events; and digital display and transactional businesses. The company was formerly known as Trinity Mirror plc and changed its name to Reach plc in May 2018. Reach plc was incorporated in 1904 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom. Reach plc operates as a subsidiary of Gannett Co., Inc.
General.Address: One Canada Square, London, United Kingdom, E14 5AP
